overview.summary: Specifies access flags for database validation.

field.name: ValidateDatabase
field.summary: Locate and release pages that are allocated but unassigned to any data structures.

field.name: SweepDatabase
field.summary: Request database sweep to mark outdated records as free space.

field.name: MendDatabase
field.summary: Mark corrupted records as unavailable, so subsequent operations skip them.

field.name: CheckDatabase
field.summary: Request read-only validation of the database, without correcting any problems.

field.name: KillShadows
field.summary: Remove references to unavailable shadow files.

field.name: Full
field.summary: Check record and page structures, releasing unassigned record fragments.

overview.summary: Request a database validation. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.para: Database validation scans internal data structures for specific types of corruption. In some cases, the validation operation can repair corruption.
The validation operation cannot guarantee to repair all cases of corruption. Do not rely on database validation as a disaster recovery policy in lieu of making regular backups of your database.
